messages.message: the changes in my PR also apply to `PathView`’s HEAD method, since the username re-assignment occurs in `_get_file_client`  https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/39980
there’s something else going wrong when `api-server` tries to read the file - have you seen this while debugging the loginless view of public apps locally? @danny.lan
I haven’t finished setting up a public app locally but let me get back to you when i do

@danny.lan Balaram pointed out that we need to change this line (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/16f0fe8/webserver/api-server/src/py/instabase/api_server/handler/api/v2/files.py#L515) to this
`file_client = _get_file_client(retry_config, use_aihub_guest=True)`

can you make this change as part of your ticket and test it with the other changes required?

i missed this case in my original PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/39980) to handle getting files as a loginless user
